title: Pentec Health Gains Elite Hall of Fame Status on Philadelphia 100 for Repeated Achievement
text:
Company Scores “Double” Recognition in Both Company and CEO Categories
Philadelphia, PA (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Pentec Health has been recognized as a member of the Philadelphia 100® for the fifth consecutive year. The Philadelphia 100® has been the hallmark of entrepreneurial achievement in the region since 1988. The project, which is run by the Wharton Small Business Development Center, The Entrepreneurs' Forum of Greater Philadelphia and the Philadelphia Business Journal, identifies and honors the 100 fastest growing, privately held entrepreneurial companies in the Greater Philadelphia Region.
In addition to making multiple appearances on the list, Pentec Health earned the added distinction of being inducted into the Philadelphia 100® Hall of Fame. In 2004, the Philadelphia 100® Hall of Fame was created as a way of honoring those winners who repeatedly made the list. The criteria for this honor is any company that makes the Philadelphia 100® list of fastest growing, privately held companies five times or more. Pentec will be inducted into the Company Hall of Fame at the organization’s annual award dinner on October 15th.
Not coincidentally, Pentec Health Chairman, CEO and President Joseph Cosgrove will be inducted into the Philadelphia 100® CEO Hall of Fame at the same event; bestowing a dual distinction on Pentec Health – company Hall of Fame and CEO Hall of Fame.
Mr. Cosgrove attributed much of his success and that of the company to his Pentec colleagues. “Pentec has been recognized as an industry leader on multiple occasions due to the dedicated, engaged and focused efforts of each and every employee – a real team effort of which I am exceedingly proud.”
About Philadelphia 100®
The Philadelphia 100® has been the hallmark of entrepreneurial achievement in the Philadelphia region since it was founded in 1998. Run jointly by the Wharton Small Business Development Center, The Entrepreneurs’ Forum of Greater Philadelphia and the Philadelphia Business Journal, it identifies and honors the 100 fastest growing companies in the Philadelphia region. This meritorious distinction is based on verifiable revenue growth as reported on federal tax forms or audited financial statements. For more information, visit http://www.Philadelphia100.com .
About Pentec Health, Inc.
For 33 years, Pentec Health has been an industry leader in providing outsorced, physician prescribed, custom prepared, patient-specific, compounded, sterile medications that are intended for patient administration in the home as well as various alternate administration sites. For more information, please visit http://www.pentechealth.com .
